item.title: CANCELLED: THE RINK (2026-01-04)
item.description:
Date: 2026-01-04
The Rink season will be shortened to provide recovery space in the amphitheater for the Raleigh Convention Center, following the December 1st fire. The last day of skating for the season will be December 28th. Red Hat Amphitheater has refunded all guests who purchased tickets for skating sessions from December 29th to January 4th. We appreciate your understanding.
